data.question: What is the empirical formula for CMOF-1?
What method was used for the structure refinement of the CMOFs?
How was the solvent content in CMOF-2 determined?
data.answer: By 1H NMR spectroscopy and thermogravimetric analysis (TGA)

data.question: What was the crystal system and space group for CMOF-3?
What was the yield of CMOF-4 when synthesized?
What was the final R indices (I>2σ(I)) for CMOF-5?
What was the purpose of using 2-(tert-butylsulfonyl)iodosylbenzene in the enantioselective epoxidation reactions?
data.answer: It was used as the oxidant for the epoxidation reactions.

data.question: How was the stability of CMOF-5 tested after the epoxidation reaction?
data.answer: By washing with CH2Cl2 and DMF, followed by analysis with PXRD.

data.question: Is the crystal structure of CMOF-1 determined to be trigonal with a space group of R32?
Did the synthesis of CMOF-3 involve the use of DEF as a solvent?
Was the solvent content for CMOF-4 determined to be 52.3% DEF and 14.9% EtOH by 1H NMR/TGA?
Is the empirical formula for CMOF-2 identical to CMOF-1?
Was the crystal color of CMOF-5 described as brown in the shape of a cube?
Did the enantioselective epoxidation reaction of alkene use CMOF-5 as a catalyst?
Was the catalyst leaching measurement for CMOF-4 performed using ICP-MS?
